title: New: Dan Deacon – True Thrush
content: Amongst yesterday’s ultimate big-band-buzz day featuring new tracks from Bloc Party, The Killers and Band of Horses, this new cut from Dan Deacon slipped under most radars, including mine. Taken from Deacon’s forthcoming album America out 27 August, True Thrush is everything we’ve grown to love from the Baltimore composer. Erratic, danceable with touches of drug induced psychedelia. Check out True Thrush below and pre-order America here.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
